overview: Clement Sciammas has 18 years of IT/Operations managerial experience gained while building teams ranging in size from 5-50 people while at a number of startups. Most recently Clement was the VP of Operations and Support for Audible Magic, an ASP providing audio identification tools that aided in the prevention of copyright infringement. Previous to that, as VP of Operations and Product Management for Citadon, he was responsible for deploying multiple data centers and creating processes allowing achievement of a 99.996 uptime percentage. Clement holds a Bachelor’s degree in Theology from Westmont College and an MBA from the University of Minnesota Carlson School.
